/*
LCD                	Arduino
PIN1 -----------  	GND
PIN2 ----------- 	5V
VO   -----------       5V
RS(CS) -----------    8; 
RW(SID) 	----------- 9; 
EN(CLK)  	----------- 3;
PIN15 PSB -----------GND;
BLA  -----------       5V
BLK  -----------       GND
*/
 
#include "LCD12864RSPI.h"
#define AR_SIZE( a ) sizeof( a ) / sizeof( a[0] )
 
unsigned char show1[]="Smart";
unsigned char show2[]="Prototyping";

};
 
void setup()
{
  LCDA.Initialise(); //Initialization LCD 
  delay(100);
  LCDA.CLEAR();  //  Clear the screen display
}
 
void loop()
{
delay(100);
//LCDA.DisplayString(1,2,show1,AR_SIZE(show1));;
//delay(100);
//LCDA.DisplayString(2,1,show2,AR_SIZE(show2));;
//delay(100);
LCDA.DrawFullScreen(logo0);
while(1);
}
